text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in https://mos.esante.gouv.fr/NOS/JDV_J230-CommuneOM-ROR/FHIR/JDV-J230-CommuneOM-ROR
  • Import all the codes that are contained in https://mos.esante.gouv.fr/NOS/JDV_JXXX-DepartementOM-ROR/FHIR/JDV-JXXX-DepartementOM-ROR
  • Import all the codes that are contained in https://mos.esante.gouv.fr/NOS/JDV_J237-RegionOM-ROR/FHIR/JDV-J237-RegionOM-ROR
  • Import all the codes that are contained in https://mos.esante.gouv.fr/NOS/JDV_JXXX-TerritoireSante-ROR/FHIR/JDV-JXXX-TerritoireSante-ROR
  • Import all the codes that are contained in https://mos.esante.gouv.fr/NOS/JDV_JXXX-Pays-ROR/FHIR/JDV-JXXX-Pays-ROR

name: CodeRegionTerritorialDivision
title: Fusion du valueset J223-TypeDivisionTerritoriale-ROR et JDV_J237-RegionOM-ROR
